title: I Can't But Jesus Can: Experiencing the Power of Surrender
description: Every revival begins with reviving your own heart. Before you can make a difference first you need to learn and be changed by the power of surrender.In this book you will discover everything you need to understand Godâ€™s will, increase your faith, and experience Jesus more intimately in your life. author: Adam Houge
